context.goal: Verify the Docling Parse V4 pipeline fix on an unrestricted environment and finalize documentation.
current_state: Code updated so Parse V4 uses StandardPdfPipeline, fix validated in theory.
Sandbox execution hits macOS seatbelt floating-point error before Docling returns output.
docs/reports/docling-fix-parsev4.txt contains manual verification steps awaiting real run.

tasks.description: Execute the verification steps on a machine without the macOS sandbox limitation.
steps: Export DOCLING_BACKEND=default and provide GEMINI_API_KEY or GOOGLE_API_KEY.
Run the Python snippet documented in docs/reports/docling-fix-parsev4.txt against tests/test_documents/sample_docling.pdf.
Optionally, launch the Streamlit app and upload the same PDF to confirm end-to-end behaviour.
Save console output showing extraction_method == 'docling' and a non-empty text snippet.
If using Streamlit, capture a screenshot or log snippet showing no backend error and populated table.
Attach artifacts (log text, screenshot filename) to the report.
Append the observed results to docs/reports/docling-fix-parsev4.txt with the verification date.
Mark the status as VERIFIED and note any remaining caveats or environment requirements.
Ensure docling-fix-parsev4 order acceptance criteria are satisfied in full.
If any issues persist, open a follow-up order documenting new findings.

acceptance_criteria: Docling Parse V4 fix verified on a real environment without sandbox crashes.
Proof of successful extraction (log/screenshot) stored and referenced.
docs/reports/docling-fix-parsev4.txt updated with VERIFIED status and evidence details.
docling-fix-parsev4 order marked complete with no remaining blockers.
notes: Run this on a local workstation or server where Docling's native libraries can execute normally; the sandbox used here cannot complete the run.
